Item.name: color_changing_time_during_jump
Item.caption: Color change time during jumping motion(sec)

Enumeration.caption: Give total numbers and random placement

Definition.tooltips: When the fish cannot be placed, it will be handled as follows: 0: Fish placed in an obstacle cell or under the minimum depth point will be removed. 1: Fish placed in an obstacle cell will be removed. 2: Fish placed in an obstacle cell or under the minimum depth point will be replaced to a random position. 3: Fish placed in an obstacle cell will be replaced to a random position.

GroupBox.caption: Counting Numbers of Fish Passing Trough

Item.name: gravel_drawable_depth
Item.caption: Critical Depth Below which gravel Draw(m)

Definition.tooltips: The Manning's roughness coefficient is used to calculate the friction velocity and eddy viscosity coefficient.
